# GET /v1/passTypeIds/{id}/relationships/certificates | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/passTypeIds/{id}/relationships/certificates ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-passTypeIds-_id_-relationships-certificates)

-  GET /v1/passTypeIds/{id}/relationships/certificates 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/passTypeIds/{id}/relationships/certificates

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-passTypeIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/passTypeIds/{id}/relationships/certificates
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-passTypeIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-passTypeIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-passTypeIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[PassTypeIdCertificatesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/passtypeidcertificateslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-passTypeIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#see-also)

### [Managing pass type Ids](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-passTypeIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#Managing-pass-type-Ids)

[`List PassTypeID Ids for a certificate`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-certificates-_id_-passtypeid)List all PassTypeID Ids for a specific certificate.[`GET /v1/certificates/{id}/relationships/passTypeId`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-certificates-_id_-relationships-passtypeid)[`List Pass Type Ids`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-passtypeids)Find and list pass type IDs that are registered to your team.[`Read PassTypeId Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-passtypeids-_id_)Get information about a specific pass type ID.[`List All Certificates for a PassTypeId`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-passtypeids-_id_-certificates)List all certificates for a specific pass type ID.[`Modify a PassTypeId`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-passtypeids-_id_)Update a specific pass type IDâ€™s name.[`Create a PassTypeId`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-passtypeids)Create a new identifier for use with a pass type ID certificate using a certificate signing request.[`Delete a PassTypeId`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-passtypeids-_id_)Delete a pass type ID that is used for app distribution.
